@@ -73,3 +73,3 @@

-            monitorEnter(new String(), true);
-            monitorEnter(new MyValue(), false, "Cannot synchronize on an instance of value class MonitorEnterTest$MyValue");

+            monitorEnter(new String(), true, "");
